title: Audit Website ADA Compliance
description: A compliance auditor tests the company's public website for compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) accessibility standards.

tasks.description: Use an automated accessibility scanning tool to scan the website for common issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool identifies multiple issues, such as low-contrast text and missing alt-text for images.

tasks.description: Manually test the website's keyboard navigation to ensure all interactive elements can be accessed without a mouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that the main navigation menu cannot be operated using only a keyboard.

tasks.description: Document the findings and recommend that the web development team remediate the issues to avoid potential legal action.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is created detailing the accessibility issues.
